name: Behold!
description: Behold is a 2D twin-stick shooter in a dark fantasy setting! Barbarians, insane wizards, total despair and bloody pieces.You are playing as a monster who is stuck between two armies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 CPU M 460 @ 2.53GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 310M Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 CPU M 460 @ 2.53GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 310M Storage: 100 MB available space
